author: Justin Hawkins Rides Again
description:
It's Christmas and I want to say thank you to everyone who has watched, liked, commented or subscribed to JHRA this year. It's been a busy one - I've spent much of it away recording a new Darkness album, so I've really appreciated everyone who has continued to visit. I have a LOT of things planned for 2025, so stick with me and let me know in the comments what you would like to see me cover: I want to do it all!

To watch Sophie Loyd's cover in full: https://youtu.be/-y9fQfnH5L0?si=KRuqlCpWkvMe3csX
Find @TheScottishSinger at: https://youtu.be/G4wu8FohalA?si=huenTzO2PmWrQpWN
And Immy's cover is here:  https://youtu.be/kqgGGQJ4U_0?si=pJlG6Y0glWrILGU4
Urban Tandoor Bristol are on TikTok

Thanks to Gareth Parker Photography for The Darkness footage at Rough Trade .

'Dreams on Toast' - the new Darkness album - is released in March, to pre-order, visit: 
https://thedarkness.lnk.to/dreamsontoast/officialstore 
We'll also be going on tour, come and see us for real:  
https://www.thedarkness
title: Happy Holidays: The Christmas Edition!
